resources.string: The service saves battery by putting screen pixels in off state.\nFor this to work, you\'ll be prompted in the next screen to enable the \'drawing over other apps\' permission.
Please allow us to draw on top of other apps so that we can start saving battery right away.
Tap outside the viewport to move it there.
Dismiss the service using the \'x\' button.
Welcome to the service that helps you save battery and gain more privacy
